headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for Tuya devices using Home Assistant Tuya Web API.
footerDisplay: If you have any suggestions, please open an issue on [GitHub](https://github.com/milo526/homebridge-tuya-web/issues).

name.title: Name
name.description: You shouldn't need to change this.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username for the account that is registered in the Android/iOS App.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password for the account that is registered in the Android/iOS App.

countryCode.title: Country Code
countryCode.description: Your account country code, e.g., 1 for USA or 86 for China.

platform.title: Platform
platform.description: The App where your account is registered. 'tuya' for Tuya Smart, 'smart_life' for Smart Life, 'jinvoo_smart' for Jinvoo Smart.

pollingInterval.title: Polling Inverval
pollingInterval.description: The frequency in seconds that the plugin polls the cloud to get device updates. When the devices are only controlled through Homebridge, you can set this to a low frequency (high interval number, e.g. 180 = 3 minutes). Defaults to 10.
